mapper.select:
SELECT sci.*, spu.name spuName, spu.category_id, IFNULL(spu.main_img_url,sku.img_url)AS imgUrl, sku.price_fee skuPriceFee, sku.sku_name FROM shop_cart_item sci JOIN spu ON spu.spu_id = sci.spu_id JOIN sku ON sku.sku_id = sci.sku_id WHERE sci.user_id = #{userId}
AND spu.status = 1 AND sku.status = 1
AND (spu.status != 1 or sku.status = 1)
AND sci.is_checked = 1
ORDER BY sci.cart_item_id DESC

update.foreach: update shop_cart_item set is_checked = #{item.isChecked} where cart_item_id = #{item.shopCartItemId} and user_id = #{userId}
